name: Fission Love
description:
A short game created for No2Nuclear Jam.

Scientists experimenting with a neutron and that neutron is in deep love, trying to find the one.

Game has two phases; first for finding the randomly assigned 4-way controller on the keyboard, and second for finding the correct match by controlling the character around the objects.

Story, visuals, music by Efe Alaçamlı

Soundtrack is available on Bandcamp.

(Currently having issues with WebGL port, so Unity web build is uploaded right now. Chrome users may not play the game on their browsers.)
